quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
quotes.author: Amela Barr

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowedge is limited, whereas imagination ambraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evaluation.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The world is full of magical things partiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Let us make our future now, let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: If people never did silly things, nothing intelligent would ever get done.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Getting information off the internet is like taking water from a fire hydrant.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kapor

quotes.quote: Simplicity, carried to the extreme, becomes elegance.
quotes.author: Jon Franklin

quotes.quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
quotes.author: Hohn Muir

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, ne would end up with wings.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: A No. 2 pencil and dream can take you anywhere.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the futire; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: let your life lightly dance n the edges of time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Dennis P. Kimbro

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to anything. One thing at a time, all things in succession. That which grows fast, withers as rapidly. That wich grows slowy, endures.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. beleive that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, i would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The quickiest way to double your money is to fold it over and puut it back in your pocket.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'life is hard', I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
quotes.author: Sydney Harris

quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts. To believe in thr heroic makes heroes..
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli
